## Request

```http
{method} /api/{example} HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Accept: */*
Host: invitation.nailseong.com

```

## Response

```http
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers

{body}
```
